share.name: Share
share.description: Copy the unique identifier of the current crosshair to your clipboard. Other players can use this identifier to import your crosshair.

import.name: Import
import.description: Import a crosshair based on its unique identifier. If the button is disabled, no valid identifier was found in your clipboard.

share.copied: The crosshair has been copied to your clipboard.
share.error: Something went wrong while generating the identifier. Please check your logs.

import.success: Successfully imported the crosshair from your clipboard.
import.invalid: Could not find a valid crosshair identifier in your clipboard.
import.error: An error occurred while importing the crosshair.
